instruction: Given a development project with a specific scope, list the most critical tasks and subtasks necessary to bring the scope into reality.
input: Project scope: Develop an online platform for tracking the course of coronavirus in the world.
output: The most critical tasks are to research existing tracking platforms, design the platform based on user needs and the latest technological advancement, develop the platform, conduct testing to ensure the accuracy of the data, and deploy the platform on the web. The subtasks involved may include tasks like creating the user interface, setting up the back-end systems, establishing data sources, handling user permission and authentication, etc.
